posts.title: Retirement: Update on retirement of TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 versions for Azure Services

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure App Configuration – Premium pricing plan now generally available

posts.title: Generally Available: FinOps toolkit 0.6 - September 2024
posts.description: In September, the FinOps toolkit 0.6 added a new library for FinOps best practices, new Power BI reports for governance and workload optimization, support for all Cost Management datasets in FinOps hubs, and more.

posts.title: Generally Available: Set fail criteria on server metrics in Azure Load Testing

posts.title: Generally Available: In-place scaling for Enterprise caches

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure SQL updates for late-October 2024

posts.title: Generally Available: ED25519 SSH key support for Linux VMs

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure Cobalt 100 Arm-based Virtual Machines
posts.description: Azure Cobalt 100 Arm-based VMs are now generally available in over 20 regions in North America, Asia, and EMEA.

posts.title: Public Preview: VM watch for Azure VMs

posts.title: Generally Available: Reduced Pricing for JBoss EAP on App Service

posts.title: Generally Available: ExpressRoute Metro

posts.title: Generally Available: GRS and CRR support for Azure VMs using Premium SSD v2 and Ultra Disk in Azure Backup
posts.description: You can now backup VMs using Premium SSDv2 and Ultra Disk with Azure Backup to GRS vaults to guard against disasters in the primary region. You can also enable cross-region to restore to test restored on-demand in the secondary region.

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure Elastic SAN for Azure VMware Solution
posts.description: Azure Elastic SAN is now generally available as a VMware Certified datastore for Azure VMware Solution (AVS). Elastic SAN offers the cheapest per GiB storage for AVS, so you can optimize your storage and lower your costs.

posts.title: Retirement: Older versions of EA Azure Price Sheet – Download by Billing Account API
posts.description: All versions of the EA Azure Price Sheet - Download by Billing Account API prior to version 2023-09-01 will be retired on June 1, 2026. Please migrate to version 2023-11-01 to take advantage of the newer and enhanced price sheet.

posts.title: Generally Available: App Service Environment memory intensive pricing tier
posts.description: New cost-effective solution for apps that need more memory resources without extra cores on Azure App Service Environment v3.

posts.title: Generally Available: Storage account default egress limit increase to 200 Gbps
posts.description: The default maximum egress for general-purpose v2 and Blob storage accounts has been increased to 200 Gbps in regions where the limit was previously 120 Gbps.

posts.title: Retirement: Announcing upcoming retirement of custom text analytics for health (preview) in Azure AI Language

posts.title: Generally Available: Several performance management server parameters now modifiable on Azure Database for PostgreSQL
posts.description: Configure a new set of server parameters for performance management—now modifiable in Azure Database for PostgreSQL — Flexible Server.

posts.title: Public Preview: vCore-based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB—up to 32 TiB storage
posts.description: Get up to 32 TiB and up to 20,000 IOPS per physical shard for larger workloads.

posts.title: Public Preview: vCore-based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB multishard, cross-region replication
posts.description: Cross-region replication on multishard clusters enables disaster recovery and read scalability for larger workloads.

posts.title: Public Preview: vCore-based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB multishard clusters

posts.title: Public Preview: Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server—support for postgresql_anonymizer extension version 1.3.2
posts.description: Get support for the postgresql_anonymizer extension, also known as the anon extension—now available in version 1.3.2. This extension helps mask or anonymize sensitive data directly within your database, providing an extra layer of data protection.

posts.title: Public Preview: DiskANN indexing on Azure Database for PostgreSQL
posts.description: Use one of the fastest vector indexing algorithms for enhanced retrieval performance and accuracy in Azure Database for PostgreSQL.

posts.title: Generally Available: Redis 7.2 on Azure Cache for Redis Enterprise
posts.description: Use an updated version of Redis on your cache instances.

posts.title: Generally Available: Dedicated gateway RBAC support and a new request option
posts.description: Authenticate requests to the dedicated gateway using role-based access control (RBAC) and have more control over what data is cached with a new request option to bypass the integrated cache.

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure Database for MySQL – Flexible Server flexible maintenance
posts.description: Easily reschedule maintenance—and automate using Azure CLI—within a maximum 30-day window.

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure Cosmos DB Data Explorer custom column selector and filter history
posts.description: Easily customize Azure Cosmos DB Data Explorer views using new custom column selector and filter history.

posts.title: Generally Available: Azure SQL updates for early-October 2024

posts.title: Generally Available: ExpressRoute guided configuration experience

This robust setup minimizes downtime and enhances operational continuity, making it ideal for enterprises requiring consistent and secure network performance.

posts.description: As we continue to enhance your experience with Azure Monitor, we want to remind you about an important update of Log search alerts V2 non common scheme e-mail templates.

posts.title: Retirement: Azure Sphere is retiring Legacy service interfaces on September 27th, 2027

posts.title: Public Preview: Switch to Azure Business Continuity Center for at scale BCDR management

posts.title: Public Preview: Azure NVads V710 v5-series virtual machines

These VMs are ideal for demanding GPU-accelerated graphics applications, cloud-based virtual desktops, high-quality gaming experiences, and small to medium AI/ML inference workloads

posts.title: Public Preview: Azure NMads MA35D-Series virtual machines
posts.description: The Azure NMads MA35D-Series virtual machines (VM) are now in public preview in the East US region, offering specialized hardware for optimized video transcoding workloads. This VM series provides higher throughput, lower latency, and access to modern codecs like AV1, making it an ideal choice for video transcoding on the cloud.
